plot: Vera stands in Daniel's bedroom shivering with fear. Next door, she hears her ex-lover talking to her husband. Patrick continues to saw Daniel's chair in the agency undaunted. When Löpelmann tries to talk him out of his engagement to Tina, he dares to cheer up against the big boss. Löpelmann, who is not used to contradiction, likes this. Peter is eager to take over the cafeteria. Julia wants to work at the beginning. Heiko is in a bad mood. When he is provoked by Patrick in the cafeteria, he strikes. Then Heiko pulls the trump card out of his sleeve: Tina is expecting a child from him.
